description: The HYDE version 3.2 contains a global model of 5 arc minute gridded historical population and land use estimates for the past 12,000 years
title: History database of the Global Environment (HYDE) version 3.2
citation: Klein Goldewijk, Dr. ir. C.G.M. (Utrecht University) (2017): Anthropogenic land-use estimates for the Holocene; HYDE 3.2. DANS. https://doi.org/10.17026/dans-25g-gez3. Accessed through Resource Watch, (date). www.resourcewatch.org.
